entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
